game.name: Next Patient
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: During a pandemic, you are a medical distribution officer at a controlled checkpoint. Review IDs, medical reports, and blood tests; approve or deny requests. Supplies are limited. Procedures are strict. The decision is yours.
game.shortDescriptionEn: During a pandemic, you are a medical distribution officer at a controlled checkpoint. Review IDs, medical reports, and blood tests; approve or deny requests. Supplies are limited. Procedures are strict. The decision is yours.
